headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Margin Jump Reinforces Bullish Narrative Despite Slower Revenue Outlook
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) posted a net profit margin of 8.1%, up from 5.8% previously, and delivered 43.6% earnings growth over the past year, defying its five-year earnings decline of 0.5% per year. Shares trade at $289.10, which is below the estimated discounted cash flow fair value of $350.28. The company’s forward earnings growth outlook is 14.7% per year, just behind the broader US market’s 15.9% forecast. The latest results reflect significant margin improvement and set the stage for...
